Patrick Epaphra Ngowi bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Tanzania, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye ndu mgbanwe ihu igwe nke Al Gore na United Nation's SDG 7 Pioneer
Patrick hiwere ma duzie ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ n'oge ọrụ ya.

Ngowi malitere azụmahịa mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ malitere ire akwụkwọ ikike kachasị elu maka ekwentị mkpanaaka na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Ngowi mere njem n'etiti China na Tanzania wee weghachite ekwentị ndị na-ewu ewu na ndị dị ọnụ ala, wee malite ịzụta ekwentị ndị dị ọnụ ala site n'aka ndị na-emepụta ọnụ ala ma na-ere ha n'ahịa Tanzania. Ọ debara aha na Mahadum Denzhou dị na China, na-amụ banyere ike ọhụrụ.
Patrick Ngowi hiwere Helvetic Solar na 2007 iji nye ma wụnye ngwá ọrụ anyanwụ na Tanzania na United States. E nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ KPMG's No
1 nke Top 100 Mid Sized Companies na Tanzania Award na 2012. Kemgbe ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ aghọwo otu azụmahịa dị iche iche, nke ọ bụ onye isi oche.

Forbes gụnyere Ngowi na ndepụta ya nke 30 under 30 Africa's Best Young Entrepreneurs na ndepụta Forbes nke Young African Millionaires to Watch na 2013. E depụtara ya ọzọ na ndepụta 2014 nke ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto kachasị mma n'Africa site na Helvetic Group. Forbes na CNBC kpọkwara ya dịka onye isi azụmahịa na-eto eto nke East Africa nke afọ 2014.

Ngowi enweela ọtụtụ ọrụ ikwu okwu na ihe omume mba ụwa ma na 2015 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke United Nations Global Compact na Tanzania.
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations kwupụtara na Ngowi bụ otu n'ime United Nation's Sustainable Development Goals (SGDs) Global 10 Pioneers, ịbụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'inye ohere ịnweta ike dị ọcha, SDG 7.
Ngowi bụ onye guzobere Light for Life Foundation, ụlọ ọrụ na-abaghị uru nke na-elekwasị anya n'inye ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ime ime obodo na mpaghara Tanzania.
